content: UFC on ABC 5Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 2 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 1 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-emmett-vs-topuria/matchesMatches(2 points each)14. Josh Emmett vs. Ilia Topuria13. Amanda Ribas vs. Maycee Barber12. Austen Lane vs. Justin Tafa11. David Onama vs. Gabriel Santos10. Brendan Allen vs. Bruno Silva(1 point each)9. Neil Magny vs. Philip Rowe8. Randy Brown vs. Wellington Turman7. Mateusz Rebecki vs. Loik Radzhabov6. Tabatha Ricci vs. Gillian Robertson5. Zhalgas Zhumagulov vs. Joshua Van4. Trevor Peek vs. Victor Martinez3. Jamall Emmers vs. Jack Jenkins2. Tatsuro Taira vs. Kleydson Rodrigues1. Cody Brundage vs. Sedriques DumasNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example14. Ilia Topuria13. Amanda Ribas12. Austen Lane11. Gabriel Santos   10. Brendan Allen9. Neil Magny8. Randy Brown 7. Loik Radzhabov6. Tabatha Ricci5. Zhalgas Zhumagulov4. Trevor Peek3. Jamall Emmers2. Tatsuro Taira1. Cody BrundageNOT go the Full Distance 7(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
